tool.name: Beacon2 CNV
tool.description: Retrieve the copy number varients from genomicVariations collection from the beacon database
tool.command: beacon2-search cnv --db-host '$db_host' --db-port $db_port --database '$database' --collection '$collection' --advance-connection --db-auth-source `jq -r .db_auth_source '$credentials'` --db-user `jq -r .db_user '$credentials'` --db-password `jq -r .db_password '$credentials'` #if str($advanced_settings.variantInternalId) --variantInternalId '$advanced_settings.variantInternalId' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.analysisId) --analysisId '$advanced_settings.analysisId' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.individualId) --individualId '$advanced_settings.individualId' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.start) --start $advanced_settings.start #end if #if str($advanced_settings.end) --end $advanced_settings.end #end if #if str($advanced_settings.chromosome) --chromosome '$advanced_settings.chromosome' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.variantStateId) --variantStateId '$advanced_settings.variantStateId' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.variantState) --variantState '$advanced_settings.variantState' #end if #if str($advanced_settings.sequenceId) --sequenceId '$advanced_settings.sequenceId' #end if > cnv_query_findings.json
tool.help: Beacon CNV Queries are supposed to return matches of any copy number variants with at least partial overlap of the input parameters
